FuncDef:
The description command configures a description for a bridge domain (BD) profile.
The undo description command deletes the description of a BD profile. The description command configures a description for a bridge domain (BD) profile. The undo description command deletes the description of a BD profile. By default, no description is configured for a BD profile. This command is supported only on the CE6863H, CE6863H-K, CE6860-SAN, CE6866K, CE6866, CE6860-HAM, CE6855-48XS8CQ, CE6885-SAN, CE8850-SAN, CE8855, CE8851-32CQ4BQ, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P, CE8850-HAM, CE6881H, CE6881H-K, CE6885, CE6885-T, CE6885-LL (standard forwarding mode) and CE6863E-48S8CQ.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the description of a BD profile.
The value is a string of 1 to 80 case-sensitive characters, spaces supported.
